summary: This mod places a room in breezehome with an atronach forge in it, so now the player doesn\'t need to go all the way into the midden just to use it.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]Note that I didn\'t put this mod into cheats and god items, because you cant operate it until you have a certain stone, I wont say which for spoilers sake. [/color]

[color=red][u][b][size=5]Description[/size][/b][/u][/color]
This mod adds a room to breezehome. Inside the room is an atronach forge. You can use it just like you use the atronach forge in the midden. For some reason the sigil stone wont show up on the pedestal where you place it, although it will still be removed from your inventory. This mod may or may not be compatible with other breezehome mods but it should be fine because only one door is added to it. Feel free to leave comments, suggestions, and general feedback in the comments section.  
Cheers, 
Bozzz

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6888730/?tb=mods&pUp=1][b][size=5]Check Out My Mods[/size][/b][/url]
author: Bozzz123
